blog.name: marveliciousfanace
blog.title: Fandom Ace
blog.description:
Remy/20 they/them/theirs
-
This is mostly me reblogging things, along with a few comments of my own. It's a mess, I don't know what to tell you. Currently Kingsman, Good Omens, and Supernatural trash. Check out my AO3, AgentStannerShipper, or send me a prompt.

tags: i keep thinking about it and getting excited
ive turned in multiple 100% papers analyzing shot choice and framing in supernatural and how its gay
cinema analysis means everything to me
summary: I hope y'all are ready for me to get my cinema student hands on Good Omens, because after the 31st? There's no escaping me...
body:
I hope y'all are ready for me to get my cinema student hands on Good Omens, because after the 31st? There’s no escaping me squealing about set dressing and camera angles.

You thought I impressed my teachers analyzing the gay in Supernatural? Just you wait…

reblog.comment:
I hope y'all are ready for me to get my cinema student hands on Good Omens, because after the 31st? There’s no escaping me squealing about set dressing and camera angles.

You thought I impressed my teachers analyzing the gay in Supernatural? Just you wait…

tags: needless to say I've not seen the leaks nor do I condone the watching of them
so the side blog will be safely spoiler-free until of course the 31st
then I'm sure it will be a rambling mess of emotions
summary: I’ve made a side blog, which is something I’ve been meaning to do for a while, mostly because the hype is high for Good Omens...
body:
I’ve made a side blog, which is something I’ve been meaning to do for a while, mostly because the hype is high for Good Omens and I didn’t want to overrun my primary blog with too-too many reblogs and ramblings as the series release date looms closer and closer. (Also, I do mostly intend to live-blog as I watch the series at some point on the 31st.) The side blog will also have smatterings of other media interests of mine (mainly other Pratchett & Gaiman things, plus Doctor Who and What We Do in the Shadows…) though this one won’t necessarily stop having those things on it, either.

TLDR: Mostly I just have too many things in my likes and they’re all getting lost and the side blog is now my shiny magpie nest to put them in.

Feel free to follow if you like! Side blog is @forsomebodyssake

title: The Devil for His Own
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VDJPJK

by regencysnuffboxes (malicegeres)

After the End of Time failed to come, there was a rebellion in Hell. This story is its history, more or less.

So, like, what if Hell decided to unionize?

Words: 3602, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Crowley (Good Omens), Aziraphale (Good Omens), Hastur (Good Omens), Original Demon Character(s)
  • Relationships: Aziraphale/Crowley (Good Omens), Implied Past Crowley/OC
  • Additional Tags: Post-Canon, Labor Unions, Established Relationship, Mentions of Torture But Nothing Graphic, Comrade Crowley, Anyway Guess What We’re Unionizing Hell!, And I’m Still Shitty At Tags!, Podfic Welcome

summary: A Nice And Accurate Place To Visit - Chapter 1 - MeltingPenguins (lilmaibe) - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett...
title: A Nice And Accurate Place To Visit - Chapter 1 - MeltingPenguins (lilmaibe) - Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 2/?
Fandom: Good Omens - Neil Gaiman & Terry Pratchett, Good Omens (TV)
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
Characters: Aziraphale (Good Omens), Crowley (Good Omens)
Summary:

Years have passed since the Armageddon’t, and things had been nice.
Till now.
Now Crowley and Aziraphale are called back to London from their cottage, and all too quickly they discover that something worse than the Apocalypse is looming.

The first full chapter is up, the character list gets expanded, the timeline is probably all over the place and Gabriel is a douchecanoe.

Enjoy

blog.name: katy-133
blog.title: Writer, Wanderer, Wonderer
blog.description:
I'm a Canadian animator for children's television series. In my spare time, I'm an artist, writer, and indie game developer.
I post my art and WIP artwork of games and visual novels I'm working on. I also do commissions on deviantART, and write the occasional academic article.

summary:
I’m so sorry! It’s been 100 years since that last WIP, but it will probably take 200 more to colour so 
in the meantime,

here’s...
caption:
I’m so sorry! It’s been 100 years since that last WIP, but it will probably take 200 more to colour so in the meantime, here’s the lineart.
Back to screaming in the void, see ya.

(re:EDIT: Less broken wrist now facing the right way!)

summary: crowley doesn’t stay every night. he goes back to the flat in mayfair occasionally to threaten his plants and, though he’d never...
body:
crowley doesn’t stay every night. he goes back to the flat in mayfair occasionally to threaten his plants and, though he’d never admit it, to catch old reruns of golden girls; aziraphale occasionally needs a little more quiet for his reading than crowley likes to give.

it’s fine. they’ve each been alone a long time, and old habits are hard to break.

but sometimes when crowley is gone, aziraphale will go to take a sip of his cocoa, long since cooled past any usual enjoyable temperature, and find it piping hot again, steam curling up from the surface like ghostly little snakes. he smiles as he sips, letting the cocoa warm him from the inside out, and knows that crowley is thinking about him.

like a goodnight kiss, aziraphale thinks.

across london, crowley’s daylilies suddenly begin to bloom in the night, and crowley watches as the petals unfurl, bright and shining in the dark of his flat. he reaches out to stroke a finger down a petal and thinks back, good night, angel. good night.

Screw you Apocalypse

Как всегда, напоминаю русскоязычным читателям: если вы берете мои арты с тамблера - указывайте в качестве источника мой паблик ВК. Ссылка на него прописана на каждом арте. Мой ник - Мартовский Заяц. Всем добра.

blog.name: hedgehogreads
blog.title: Quotes, Not Just About Hedgehogs
blog.description: A place for quotes from books I've read.  Currently Reading: Always Look on the Bright Side of Life, Eric Idle.

summary: “You grow up readin’ about pirates and cowboys and spacemen and stuff, and jus’ when you think the world’s all full of amazin’...
body:
“You grow up readin’ about pirates and cowboys and spacemen and stuff, and jus’ when you think the world’s all full of amazin’ things, they tell you it’s really all dead whales and chopped-down forests and nuclear waste hangin’ about for millions of years. ‘Snot worth growin’ up for, if you ask my opinion.”

 - Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett, Good Omens

reblog.comment:

body: all this good omens content coming out is making me super nostalgic for my high school days after i first read it and was completely obsessed,, making bad drawings on scrap pieces of paper at the school library during study hall,,, it wasn’t much but i sure was happy

summary: Got to watch Good Omens Episode 1 at the LA screening by Cinespia and had an awesome time!! The event was amazing, the episode...
body: Got to watch Good Omens Episode 1 at the LA screening by Cinespia and had an awesome time!! The event was amazing, the episode was amazing, and I got to talk to the amazing and kind Mr. Gaiman luckily, in a graveyard. Neil’s opening for the episode talked about Terry and how happy Terry would have been to see this premiered in a cemetery, the great cast in general, and fanboy Jon Hamm, etc. Can’t wait to see the episode again and all the others on the 31st!!
